==== constructorWithParameterPropertiesAndPrivateFields.es2015.ts (4 errors) ====
    // https://github.com/microsoft/TypeScript/issues/48771
    
    class A {
      readonly #privateField: string;
    
      constructor(arg: { key: string }, public exposedField: number) {
        ({ key: this.#privateField } = arg);
      }
    
      log() {
        console.log(this.#privateField);
        ~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2584: Cannot find name 'console'. Do you need to change your target library? Try changing the 'lib' compiler option to include 'dom'.
        console.log(this.exposedField);
        ~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2584: Cannot find name 'console'. Do you need to change your target library? Try changing the 'lib' compiler option to include 'dom'.
      }
    }
    
    class B {
      readonly #privateField: string;
    
      constructor(arg: { key: string }, public exposedField: number) {
        "prologue";
        ({ key: this.#privateField } = arg);
      }
    
      log() {
        console.log(this.#privateField);
        ~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2584: Cannot find name 'console'. Do you need to change your target library? Try changing the 'lib' compiler option to include 'dom'.
        console.log(this.exposedField);
        ~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2584: Cannot find name 'console'. Do you need to change your target library? Try changing the 'lib' compiler option to include 'dom'.
      }
    }
